description:
Kazuma Azuma lives in the country and is in a family of rice farmers. When his sister Inaho asks to have bread for bread for breakfast, grandfather Umataro refuses. It’s up to Kazuma to make a bread that will convince him! His journey for Ja-pan starts now!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: He`s Here!! The Boy with the Hands of the Sun!
